Subject: Vulnerabilities
Description:
Hi,

We have ran a vulnerability scan against the Endpoint protector server using Tenable Nessus vulnerability scanner.

Tenable has found 116 Vulnerabilities, of which
Critical - 15
High - 65
Medium - 36

According to live status, having clicked on "check backend updates" the backend security updates is upto date.

Can you please advise the best way forward to resolve the vulnerabilities?
What_We_Know__c:
Customer have ran a vulnerability scan against the Endpoint protector server using Tenable Nessus vulnerability scanner.

They have the latest EPP server version and the latest security updates applied.
Next_Steps__c:
We raised an ADO for the vulnerabilities and currently we are waiting for their response.
